casebody.data:
BALTIMORE AND OHIO RAILROAD COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Honorable James C. CONNELL, Respondent. No. 12800. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. Feb. 13, 1956. Baker, Hostetler & Patterson, Cleveland, Ohio, for petitioner. No appearance for respondent.

Before MARTIN, McALLISTER and STEWART, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The petition for a writ of mandamus is denied.
